questions.question: Q1. Floyd Warshall is better as compared to dijkstra's algorithm because:

answers.c: It can handle both negative edges and negative cycles
answers.d: It has a lower time complexity

explanations.b: Floyd Warshall has more time complexity than dijkstra's algorithm but it can handle negative edges, the algorithm can't handle negative cycles.

questions.question: Q2. Floyd warshall algorithm is used to find:

explanations.c: Floyd warshall algorithm is used to find all pair shortest path.

explanations.b: Floyd Warshall is a dynamic programming-based algorithm. The algorithm reduces the overlapping subproblems by storing the results of the subproblems in a distance table.

questions.question: Q4. In the given graph :

explanations.a: The sum of edges 4->0 , 0->2 and 2->4 is 13 which is greater than 0. Thus it is not a negative cycle
explanations.b: The sum of edges 4->0 , 0->5 , 5->1 and 1->4 is -1 which is less than 0. Thus it is a negative cycle
explanations.c: The sum of edges 4->5 , 5->1 and 1->4 is 8 which is greater than 0. Thus it is not a negative cycle

questions.question: Q5. The approach used in Floyd Warshall algorithm is:

explanations.b: The approach used in Floyd Warshall algorithm is bottom up approach.This approach uses the tabulation technique to implement the dynamic programming solution. It addresses the same problems as before, but without recursion
